item.description:
Are you new to running?  Have you ever been properly fitted for running sneakers?  Or are you in need for a new pair but not sure what to try? 

Come join us for a Gait Analysis at Greater Boston Running Company at Derby Street Shoppes in Hingham where experts will help you find the best running shoes for YOU! 

(GBRC is located near Whole Foods)

This event starts at 6pm on Tuesday, April 10th.
The more people who join this event, the bigger the discount!!!  So come on by!!

Greater Boston Running Company is offering us a 20% discount on footwear and apparel for a group of 20 or more.  If the group is smaller, they are still offering us a 10% discount. 

So sign up and come on by!  If you are planning on joining us for the Couch to 5K event, this is a great way to get yourself ready to go!!  And bring your friends too!  Remember, 20+ people we get the 20% discount for all!!  :)

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Gait Analysis at Greater Boston Running Company
